subject: [junit] Use of listener
msgSnippet: Hi, I have test s written in junit4 that run using JUnitTestRunner. I want to add listener that will be called in start and end of each test and also before
messageBody:
Hi,

I have test's written in junit4 that run using JUnitTestRunner.
I want to add listener that will be called in start and end of each test and
also before and after @Before method.The target is that each test (include
before and after method if it has) will send the output to different file.
Is that possible?

Thanks

--
